content: Can we have a stream for posting jokes related to the Rust project?
It'll have to be a Firefox-only stream though, if you want the jokes to involve Rust.
I would personally like to not do so in this Zulip, but I won't block it.
I would generally suggest against having an "off-topic" stream. They tend to be a source of particular problem for moderators.
(going by experience from many other forums and chat servers)
... should we re-write Zulip in Rust?
You could call the stream #unsafe. :drum:
the community discord already tried that and it went ... poorly
I'm fine with saying 'go to the community discord if you want to be offtopic'
